body.name: RAOYI 1TB Internal SSD SATA III 2.5”Internal Solid State Drive 3D NAND Flash Advanced SSD Internal Hard Drive Up to 500MB/s SATA 3 SSD Upgrade Performance for PC Laptop
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 13 mins
features: ►【Improve Performance】: Optimizing SATA 3.0 technology to boost read/write speed up to 500/450MB/s, this internal SSD offers blazing-fast performance to upgrade your computer, speed up data transfer, accelerate boot time, and improve game responsiveness.（Note: Testing speed with CrystalDiskMark software will be more accurate.）

►【Widely Compatible】: This standard SATA III 2.5” internal solid state drive widely supports Windows, Linux, and Mac OS, and is backward compatible with SATA 2.0 and 1.0, giving significant improvement for your desktops, PCs, and laptops.

►【Reliable & Durable】: Utilizing superior flash memory chips coupled with top-quality ABS casing, this SSD internal hard drive features excellent heat dissipation, less power consumption, and outstanding shock resistance, offering extraordinary durability and reliability.

►【Versatile Use】: This SATA 3 SSD hard drive uses advanced 3D NANA technology to upgrade your PC performance, ideal for gaming, data analysis, graphic design, video editing, and multitasking for everyday users and creators.
►【What You Get】: 1 x 1TB Internal Solid State Drive, 1 x User Manual, 12-Month Warranty and Lifetime Technology Support. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about the SSD.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Shock resistant and durable, Advanced 3D NANA technology, High read/write speed to 500/450MB/s, SATA 3.0 technology, Reliable performance See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade Performance Boosting read/write speed to 500/450MB/s, this internal solid state hard drive optimizes SATA 3.0 technology to offer blazing-fast performance to replace your old hard drive or upgrade your existing SSD. Advanced 3D NAND Tech Adopting advanced 3D NANA technology, this SATA 3.0 SSD offers faster system startup, quick application loading, rapid file transfer, and smooth game playing, perfect for creators, Pros, and everyday users. Reliable Performance With no moving parts, this SSD hard drive is shock resistant and durable to protect data. Each internal SSD is rigorously tested to ensure reliable performance, taking your productivity to new heights.

Wide Use : This SATA 2.5” internal SSD is compatible with Windows, Linux, and Mac OS, fitting desktops, PCs, and laptops. Super fast speed and reliable performance are ideal for gaming, data analysis, graphic design, video editing, and multitasking. Specifications: Rated: DC 5V --1A Interface: SATA III 2.5‘’ SSD 1GB=1,000,000,000 bytes. Actual user storage less. Package Weight: 65g Package includes: 1 x SATA 2.5” Internal Solid State Hard Drive 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This brand was new to me. I took a chance on Raoyi and to my surprise, I am very impressed with the speed.In fact, it seems to be performing better than some of the best, well known brands. I would highly recommend this 512GB SSD to anyone who needs a great experience at a decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Storage that's true to size
reviews.reviewText: The I got 480 gb but so far it works well and haven't had any problems I used to backup my files on WD mycloud os3 it become obsolete a few years ago I didn't want to back up my files to a mechanical drive I can use this and store it almost anywhere and not have to worry about it getting dropped, jard or something that would make it inoperable losing access to my files and videos and if one fails I can create another backup from either even though they say recovery is more than likely impossible from a failed ssd it's still worth risk because they less likely to fail or get damaged from movement or physical mishaps like dropping or some other human error

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good drive for external storage
reviews.reviewText: A good SSD for external storage, if you put it in a drive case. Seems fast enough, but I haven't tested it for speed. It worked right away and has not failed in several months of occasional use. I wouldn't expect it to fail, but new brands don't have a track record yet. I did not comparison shop, however I remember the price of name brands to be only about 20% more than this drive, so if you want to save some money with an SSD that is not for a critical use, give this a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hasta ahora sin mayores problemas, todo correcto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fast SSD!
reviews.reviewText: this SSD is comparable to my Samsung SSD which cost nearly double the price. The performance is excellent, it was easy to install. All i had to do was plug it in, format it and it was ready to go. it maintained a 580 MB/s write speed while downloading a 300gb game. for this price, it's a fantastic SSD. i will definitely come back to buy RAOYI SSDs again. great product, great price, great performance.
